src.data.raw.plays

Helper functions for fetching raw NFL play-by-play data.

https://github.com/nflverse/nflverse-data/releases/tag/pbp

src.data.raw.plays.fetch_pbp_data(url, path, filename)[source]

Fetch raw play-by-play data for a given season and write to disk.

Parameters:

  • url (str) – url to fetch data from

  • path (str) – dir to write data to

  • filename (str) – name of file to write data to

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

src.data.raw.plays.find_missing_seasons(current_season, path)[source]

Find any missing local pbp season files.

Parameters:

  • current_season (int) – current nfl season

  • path (str) – dir to search for files

Yield:

missing season filenames

Return type:

str

src.data.raw.plays.refresh_plays_data(current_season, url, path)[source]

Refresh raw play-by-play data if necessary.

Parameters:

  • current_season (int) – current nfl season

  • url (str) – url to fetch data from

  • path (str) – dir to write data to

Returns:

None

Return type:

None
